item.title: 2025 weekend trips and events
item.description:
A summary of weekend trips taken and events that we have attended during 2025, for memory keeping.

  • January: Bangalee & Shoalhaven Heads 3 days
  • June: Malua Bay for the long weekend

item.title: 2024 weekend trips and events
item.description:
A summary of weekend trips taken and events that we have attended during 2024, for memory keeping.

  • Visit Goulburn - day trip
  • Visit Bungendore - day trip
  • Visit Lake George
  • New Year’s Eve 2024 firework
  • Floriade
  • Balloon Festival
  • National Multicultural Festival
  • Christmas Picnic at Uriarra East

item.title: Rodney's Nursery & Garden Center
item.description:
If you are a Canberran and you enjoy gardening and growing vegetables, you should know about Rodney’s nursery and his café. Ever since my mother moved to Canberra in March this year, I have been wanting to take her here for a meal. It has been raining for the past few weeks, and today it finally cleared up. The three of us wander here for lunch.

The garden café was already quite busy at around 11:00 on a Sunday morning. Although it was a cold winter morning, the sun was out, and sitting by the outdoor electric heater, it didn’t feel cold at all.
